description: Good burn.  Steady ascent, no switchbacks.  Hike through pockets of sloped alpine meadows and pine stands.  The chances to see bighorn sheep is really good.  Excellent views all the way up.
directions: Take Hwy 11 west of Rockey Mountain House to Nordeg.  Continue 65 kilometers west/south of Nordeg to unnamed creek (2 kilometers past Siffleur staging area parking lot).  Park in ditch on west side of highway.  Trail follows creek bed west away from the highway.
title: Tuff Puff
